title: WTT: rough T206 Matty white cap for a Matty portrait or dark cap...

posts.post_title: WTT: rough T206 Matty white cap for a Matty portrait or dark cap...
posts.post_content:
Sorry for the lousy scans.  You get the idea though.

I'm looking to trade this white cap Mathewson for the portrait or black cap in equivalent condition.

Please email me if you should desire to make a trade.  Thank you.  :)
